lightning_strike.name: Lightning Strike
lightning_strike.description: Attacks an enemy with lightning and stuns them for 1 turn with a 35% chance.

olympian_thunder.name: Olympian Thunder
olympian_thunder.description: Attacks all enemies 2 times with lightning. Each attack has a 30% chance to decrease Attack Speed for 2 turns.

tidal_wave.name: Tidal Wave
tidal_wave.description: Attacks an enemy and decreases its Attack Bar by 30% with a 50% chance.

ocean_fury.name: Ocean's Fury
ocean_fury.description: Attacks all enemies and decreases their Attack Speed for 2 turns. Damage increases by 20% for each debuff on the enemy.

soul_reaper.name: Soul Reaper
soul_reaper.description: Attacks an enemy and recovers HP by 30% of the damage dealt. Damage increases by 50% if the enemy is under harmful effects.

underworld_chains.name: Underworld Chains
underworld_chains.description: Attacks all enemies with chains from the underworld, inflicting Unrecoverable for 2 turns and stealing 20% of their Attack Bar.

spear_strike.name: Spear Strike
spear_strike.description: Attacks an enemy with a spear. Damage increases by 20% for each buff on yourself.

aegis_protection.name: Aegis Protection
aegis_protection.description: Grants a shield on all allies for 3 turns. Shield amount is proportional to 20% of Athena's MAX HP.

solar_arrow.name: Solar Arrow
solar_arrow.description: Shoots a burning arrow at an enemy, dealing damage and inflicting Continuous Damage for 2 turns.

healing_light.name: Healing Light
healing_light.description: Recovers the HP of all allies by 25% and increases their ATK for 2 turns.

hunter_shot.name: Hunter's Shot
hunter_shot.description: Attacks an enemy and decreases its Defense for 2 turns. Always lands as a Critical Hit if the enemy's HP is below 50%.

arrow_volley.name: Arrow Volley
arrow_volley.description: Attacks random enemies 4 times. Each attack has a 30% chance to decrease Attack Bar by 30%.

brutal_strike.name: Brutal Strike
brutal_strike.description: Attacks an enemy with a 30% chance to attack again.

war_cry.name: War Cry
war_cry.description: Increases the Attack Power and Critical Rate of all allies for 2 turns.

swift_strike.name: Swift Strike
swift_strike.description: Attacks an enemy. Speed increases by 15 for 1 turn if the attack lands as a Critical Hit.

messenger_blessing.name: Messenger's Blessing
messenger_blessing.description: Increases the Attack Bar of all allies by 30% and their Attack Speed for 2 turns.

gungnir_thrust.name: Gungnir Thrust
gungnir_thrust.description: Attacks an enemy with the legendary spear. This attack always lands as a Critical Hit and ignores Defense.

ravens_wisdom.name: Raven's Wisdom
ravens_wisdom.description: Attacks all enemies and brands them for 2 turns. Branded enemies receive 25% increased damage.

hammer_strike.name: Hammer Strike
hammer_strike.description: Attacks an enemy with Mjolnir and stuns the target for 1 turn with a 35% chance.

thunder_crash.name: Thunder Crash
thunder_crash.description: Attacks all enemies with lightning, stunning them for 1 turn with a 60% chance. Damage is proportional to your MAX HP.

charm_strike.name: Charm Strike
charm_strike.description: Attacks an enemy and provokes them for 1 turn with a 75% chance.

battle_blessing.name: Battle Blessing
battle_blessing.description: Removes all harmful effects on all allies and grants immunity for 2 turns.

trick_attack.name: Trick Attack
trick_attack.description: Attacks an enemy and steals one beneficial effect. Damage increases by 30% per harmful effect on the enemy.

chaos_field.name: Chaos Field
chaos_field.description: Attacks all enemies and randomly applies 2 harmful effects for 2 turns (Defense Break, Attack Break, Glancing, or Slow).

radiant_strike.name: Radiant Strike
radiant_strike.description: Attacks an enemy with holy light. Recovers the HP of the ally with the lowest HP ratio by 15%.

light_sanctuary.name: Light Sanctuary
light_sanctuary.description: Creates a shield on all allies for 2 turns equal to 15% of Baldur's MAX HP and increases Defense for 2 turns.

justice_blade.name: Justice Blade
justice_blade.description: Attacks an enemy and decreases their ATK and DEF for 2 turns with a 50% chance each.

valor_charge.name: Valor Charge
valor_charge.description: Charges at the enemy with the lowest HP, dealing damage proportional to your Defense. Gains Increase DEF for 2 turns.

vigilant_strike.name: Vigilant Strike
vigilant_strike.description: Attacks an enemy. Gains 50% increased Accuracy for your next turn.

rainbow_sight.name: Rainbow Sight
rainbow_sight.description: Grants all allies increased Critical Rate for 2 turns and increases their Attack Bar by 20%.

frost_touch.name: Frost Touch
frost_touch.description: Attacks an enemy and freezes them for 1 turn with a 25% chance.

foresight.name: Foresight
foresight.description: All allies gain 20% chance to Glancing Hit Rate for 2 turns and recover 15% HP.

sun_ray.name: Sun Ray
sun_ray.description: Attacks an enemy with the power of the sun. Damage increases by 50% if the target is under inability effects.

solar_blessing.name: Solar Blessing
solar_blessing.description: Attacks all enemies and inflicts 2 Continuous Damage for 3 turns. Grants all allies Increase ATK for 2 turns.

soul_judge.name: Soul Judge
soul_judge.description: Attacks an enemy and inflicts Brand for 2 turns. Recovers HP by 20% of damage dealt.

death_sentence.name: Death Sentence
death_sentence.description: Attacks all enemies and blocks beneficial effects for 2 turns. Damage increases according to enemy's current HP.

mystic_wave.name: Mystic Wave
mystic_wave.description: Attacks an enemy and heals all allies by 10% of their MAX HP.

divine_protection.name: Divine Protection
divine_protection.description: Removes 2 harmful effects from all allies and grants them a shield for 3 turns (20% of Isis's MAX HP).

knowledge_strike.name: Knowledge Strike
knowledge_strike.description: Attacks an enemy with a 50% chance to remove a beneficial effect.

wisdom_share.name: Wisdom Share
wisdom_share.description: Increases Attack Bar of all allies by 25% and grants Attack Increase SPD for 2 turns.

divine_punishment.name: Divine Punishment
divine_punishment.description: Attacks an enemy and removes all beneficial effects. Stuns for 1 turn if any effects were removed.

queen_authority.name: Queen's Authority
queen_authority.description: Attacks all enemies and decreases their ATK and DEF for 2 turns. Allies gain Counterattack for 2 turns.

sacred_flame.name: Sacred Flame
sacred_flame.description: Attacks an enemy with holy fire and recovers the HP of all allies by 10%.

hearth_blessing.name: Hearth Blessing
hearth_blessing.description: Heals all allies by 30% and grants them Continuous Recovery for 3 turns.

nature_strike.name: Nature's Strike
nature_strike.description: Attacks an enemy and grants all allies Continuous Recovery for 2 turns.

harvest_blessing.name: Harvest Blessing
harvest_blessing.description: Increases the Attack Bar of all allies by 30% and their Attack and Defense for 2 turns.

intoxicate.name: Intoxicate
intoxicate.description: Attacks an enemy and applies Glancing Hit debuff for 2 turns with a 75% chance.

madness_field.name: Madness Field
madness_field.description: Attacks all enemies with a 50% chance to provoke them for 1 turn.

forge_hammer.name: Forge Hammer
forge_hammer.description: Attacks an enemy with a chance to inflict Defense break for 2 turns (75% chance).

molten_forge.name: Molten Forge
molten_forge.description: Attacks all enemies with molten metal and increases all allies' CRI DMG for 2 turns.

charm_touch.name: Charm Touch
charm_touch.description: Attacks an enemy and puts them to sleep for 1 turn with a 50% chance.

beauty_blessing.name: Beauty's Blessing
beauty_blessing.description: Removes one harmful effect from all allies and heals them by 20%. Grants immunity for 1 turn.

underworld_grasp.name: Underworld Grasp
underworld_grasp.description: Attacks an enemy with a 30% chance to decrease their Attack Bar by 50%.

season_change.name: Season Change
season_change.description: Recovers the HP of all allies by 20% and increases their Attack Speed for 2 turns.

celestial_strike.name: Celestial Strike
celestial_strike.description: Attacks an enemy and ignores all damage reduction effects. Always lands as a crushing hit.

heavenly_decree.name: Heavenly Decree
heavenly_decree.description: Attacks all enemies and applies Oblivion for 2 turns, preventing passive abilities. Increases all allies' Attack Bar by 25%.

dragon_claw.name: Dragon Claw
dragon_claw.description: Attacks an enemy 2 times. Each attack has a 30% chance to decrease Attack Speed for 2 turns.

tidal_dragon.name: Tidal Dragon
tidal_dragon.description: Transforms into dragon form and attacks all enemies. Freezes them for 1 turn with a 75% chance.

staff_strike.name: Staff Strike
staff_strike.description: Attacks an enemy and gains another turn with a 30% chance.

clone_attack.name: Clone Attack
clone_attack.description: Creates clones and attacks random enemies 5 times. Each hit decreases Attack Bar by 15%.

moon_strike.name: Moon Strike
moon_strike.description: Attacks an enemy with a 30% chance to put them to sleep for 1 turn.

lunar_blessing.name: Lunar Blessing
lunar_blessing.description: All allies recover 25% HP and gain a shield equal to 15% of their MAX HP for 2 turns.

fire_spear.name: Fire Spear
fire_spear.description: Attacks an enemy with a fire spear and inflicts Continuous Damage for 3 turns.

lotus_rebirth.name: Lotus Rebirth
lotus_rebirth.description: Attacks all enemies and grants yourself immunity and invincibility for 1 turn.

mercy_touch.name: Mercy Touch
mercy_touch.description: Heals an ally by 50% of their MAX HP and grants immunity for 2 turns.

thousand_hands.name: Thousand Hands
thousand_hands.description: Heals all allies by 30% and removes all harmful effects. Grants 2-turn Continuous Recovery.

thunder_drum.name: Thunder Drum
thunder_drum.description: Attacks an enemy with thunder and has a 25% chance to stun for 1 turn.

lightning_justice.name: Lightning Justice
lightning_justice.description: Attacks all enemies. Damage increases by 20% for each debuff on the target.

dragon_blade.name: Dragon Blade
dragon_blade.description: Attacks an enemy and decreases their Defense for 2 turns with a 75% chance.

brotherhood_oath.name: Brotherhood Oath
brotherhood_oath.description: Increases Attack and Defense of all allies for 2 turns.

thunder_axe.name: Thunder Axe
thunder_axe.description: Attacks an enemy with a thunderous axe strike. Always lands as a Critical Hit.

storm_call.name: Storm Call
storm_call.description: Attacks all enemies with lightning and thunder, stunning them for 1 turn with a 50% chance.

forge_strike.name: Forge Strike
forge_strike.description: Attacks an enemy and increases all allies' CRI DMG for 2 turns.

celestial_forge.name: Celestial Forge
celestial_forge.description: Grants all allies Attack and Increase DEFs for 3 turns and increases their Attack Bar by 25%.

earth_blessing.name: Earth Blessing
earth_blessing.description: Heals all allies by 30% and grants Continuous Recovery for 2 turns.

mother_protection.name: Mother's Protection
mother_protection.description: Grants shields to all allies equal to 20% of Mokosh's MAX HP for 3 turns and immunity for 1 turn.

serpent_strike.name: Serpent Strike
serpent_strike.description: Attacks an enemy and steals 30% of their Attack Bar.

underworld_wisdom.name: Underworld Wisdom
underworld_wisdom.description: Attacks all enemies and applies 2 random debuffs for 2 turns.

love_touch.name: Love's Touch
love_touch.description: Heals an ally by 40% and removes one harmful effect.

harmony_field.name: Harmony Field
harmony_field.description: Removes one harmful effect from all allies and heals them by 20%.

protective_strike.name: Protective Strike
protective_strike.description: Attacks an enemy and grants yourself a shield for 2 turns.

household_blessing.name: Household Blessing
household_blessing.description: Grants all allies Increase DEF and shield for 2 turns.

serpent_bite.name: Serpent Bite
serpent_bite.description: Attacks an enemy and inflicts Continuous Damage for 3 turns. Damage scales with MAX HP.

world_coil.name: World Coil
world_coil.description: Attacks all enemies and decreases their Attack Speed for 2 turns. Applies inability effects for 1 turn with 50% chance.

wolf_bite.name: Wolf Bite
wolf_bite.description: Attacks an enemy and inflicts Brand and Defense break for 2 turns.

ragnarok_howl.name: Ragnarok Howl
ragnarok_howl.description: Attacks all enemies ignoring defense. Damage increases by 30% per debuff on self.

silent_strike.name: Silent Strike
silent_strike.description: Attacks an enemy and silences them for 2 turns with 75% chance.

vengeance_boot.name: Vengeance Boot
vengeance_boot.description: Attacks the enemy with the highest Attack, stunning them for 1 turn. Damage increases by 50% if any ally has died.

word_strike.name: Word Strike
word_strike.description: Attacks an enemy with magical words. Damage increases with your speed.

inspiring_poem.name: Inspiring Poem
inspiring_poem.description: Increases Attack Bar of all allies by 30% and their Attack Power for 2 turns.

death_touch.name: Death Touch
death_touch.description: Attacks an enemy and brands them for 2 turns. Recovers HP equal to 30% of damage dealt.

judgment_of_dead.name: Judgment of Dead
judgment_of_dead.description: Attacks all enemies. Damage increases by 50% against enemies with inability effects. Applies heal block for 2 turns.

falcon_strike.name: Falcon Strike
falcon_strike.description: Attacks an enemy 2 times. Each hit has a 50% chance to increase your Attack Bar by 15%.

eye_of_horus.name: Eye of Horus
eye_of_horus.description: Removes all harmful effects from all allies and grants them immunity and shield for 2 turns.

cat_scratch.name: Cat Scratch
cat_scratch.description: Attacks an enemy 3 times. Each hit has a 30% chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns.

feline_agility.name: Feline Agility
feline_agility.description: Increases Attack Bar of all allies by 25% and their Attack Speed for 2 turns.

crocodile_bite.name: Crocodile Bite
crocodile_bite.description: Attacks an enemy and provokes them for 1 turn with a 75% chance.

death_roll.name: Death Roll
death_roll.description: Attacks an enemy based on your MAX HP and stuns them for 1 turn.

chaos_strike.name: Chaos Strike
chaos_strike.description: Attacks an enemy and applies a random debuff for 2 turns.

desert_storm.name: Desert Storm
desert_storm.description: Attacks all enemies and inflicts Unrecoverable for 2 turns. Damage increases against enemies with beneficial effects.

creator_strike.name: Creator's Strike
creator_strike.description: Attacks an enemy and increases your Defense for 2 turns.

divine_construction.name: Divine Construction
divine_construction.description: Grants all allies shields for 3 turns and Increase DEF for 2 turns.

lioness_strike.name: Lioness Strike
lioness_strike.description: Attacks an enemy with a 50% chance to inflict Continuous Damage for 2 turns.

solar_fury.name: Solar Fury
solar_fury.description: Attacks all enemies with burning solar energy. Inflicts Continuous Damage for 2 turns.

shadow_strike.name: Shadow Strike
shadow_strike.description: Attacks an enemy and decreases their Attack Bar by 30%.

mourning_veil.name: Mourning Veil
mourning_veil.description: Heals all allies by 25% and removes one harmful effect from each ally.

creation_touch.name: Creation Touch
creation_touch.description: Attacks an enemy and grants a random beneficial effect to all allies for 2 turns.

cosmic_knowledge.name: Cosmic Knowledge
cosmic_knowledge.description: Removes all harmful effects from all allies and increases their Attack Bar by 30%. Grants 2-turn immunity.

discus_throw.name: Discus Throw
discus_throw.description: Attacks all enemies 2 times. Each hit has a 35% chance to decrease Attack Bar by 20%.

preservation_shield.name: Preservation Shield
preservation_shield.description: Grants all allies a shield for 3 turns and immunity for 2 turns. Shield amount equals 25% of Vishnu's MAX HP.

trident_strike.name: Trident Strike
trident_strike.description: Attacks an enemy 3 times. Each critical hit ignores 50% of the target's defense.

cosmic_dance.name: Cosmic Dance
cosmic_dance.description: Attacks all enemies ignoring defense and immunity. Inflicts 2 Continuous Damage for 3 turns.

tusk_strike.name: Tusk Strike
tusk_strike.description: Attacks an enemy based on your Defense and provokes them for 1 turn.

obstacle_removal.name: Obstacle Removal
obstacle_removal.description: Removes all harmful effects from all allies and grants them immunity for 1 turn. Increases Attack Bar by 20%.

monkey_strike.name: Monkey Strike
monkey_strike.description: Attacks an enemy 2 times. Each hit has a 25% chance to gain another turn.

mountain_leap.name: Mountain Leap
mountain_leap.description: Attacks all enemies and increases Attack Bar of all allies by 30%. Grants Increase ATK for 2 turns.

multi_weapon.name: Multi-Weapon Strike
multi_weapon.description: Attacks random enemies 5 times. Each hit has different effects.

demon_slayer.name: Demon Slayer
demon_slayer.description: Attacks all enemies. Damage increases by 30% per debuff on the target. Ignores defense.

lotus_blessing.name: Lotus Blessing
lotus_blessing.description: Heals all allies by 35% and grants them Continuous Recovery for 2 turns.

prosperity_wave.name: Prosperity Wave
prosperity_wave.description: Increases Attack Bar of all allies by 30% and grants random beneficial effects for 2 turns.

wisdom_strike.name: Wisdom Strike
wisdom_strike.description: Attacks an enemy and removes one beneficial effect. Increases your Attack Bar by 25%.

knowledge_flow.name: Knowledge Flow
knowledge_flow.description: Increases Attack Bar of all allies by 40% and their Critical Rate for 2 turns.

vajra_bolt.name: Vajra Bolt
vajra_bolt.description: Attacks an enemy with lightning that always lands as a Critical Hit.

storm_command.name: Storm Command
storm_command.description: Attacks all enemies with chain lightning. Each enemy hit has a 50% chance to be stunned for 1 turn.

time_strike.name: Time Strike
time_strike.description: Attacks an enemy and resets all their beneficial effect durations to 1 turn.

destruction_dance.name: Destruction Dance
destruction_dance.description: Attacks all enemies 2 times. Each hit ignores 30% defense. Grants yourself immunity for 1 turn.

solar_ray.name: Solar Ray
solar_ray.description: Attacks an enemy and inflicts Continuous Damage for 2 turns.

dawn_blessing.name: Dawn Blessing
dawn_blessing.description: Heals all allies by 25% and increases their Attack for 2 turns.

tidal_pull.name: Tidal Pull
tidal_pull.description: Decreases Attack Bar of all enemies by 20% and slows them for 2 turns.

club_strike.name: Club Strike
club_strike.description: Attacks an enemy with massive force. Damage scales with MAX HP. Stuns for 1 turn.

cauldron_plenty.name: Cauldron of Plenty
cauldron_plenty.description: Heals all allies to full HP and grants them immunity for 2 turns.

triple_blessing.name: Triple Blessing

skill_strike.name: Skillful Strike
skill_strike.description: Attacks an enemy 3 times. Each hit has a different effect: Defense break, Attack break, and Slow for 1 turn.

harvest_festival.name: Harvest Festival
harvest_festival.description: Attacks all enemies and increases all allies' Attack Bar by 35%.

crow_strike.name: Crow Strike
crow_strike.description: Attacks an enemy and inflicts 2 random debuffs for 2 turns.

doom_prophecy.name: Doom Prophecy
doom_prophecy.description: Marks all enemies with doom, increasing damage they take by 25% for 2 turns. Allies gain Increase ATK.

antler_charge.name: Antler Charge
antler_charge.description: Charges at an enemy with antlers. Damage scales with Defense.

wild_hunt.name: Wild Hunt
wild_hunt.description: Summons the wild hunt to attack all enemies and grant all allies increased Critical Rate for 2 turns.

otherworld_song.name: Otherworld Song
otherworld_song.description: Sings a magical song that increases all allies' Attack Bar by 40% and Speed for 2 turns.

sea_strike.name: Sea Strike
sea_strike.description: Attacks an enemy and freezes them for 1 turn with a 35% chance.

mist_veil.name: Mist Veil
mist_veil.description: All allies gain increased dodge chance by 30% for 2 turns and recover 20% HP.

solar_strike.name: Solar Strike
solar_strike.description: Attacks an enemy with solar fire. Inflicts 2 Continuous Damage for 2 turns.

beltane_fire.name: Beltane Fire
beltane_fire.description: Attacks all enemies with sacred fire and heals all allies by 15%.

healing_touch.name: Healing Touch
healing_touch.description: Heals an ally by 50% and removes all harmful effects.

healing_well.name: Healing Well

silver_strike.name: Silver Strike
silver_strike.description: Attacks an enemy with the silver arm. Damage increases by 50% if the enemy has beneficial effects.

royal_command.name: Royal Command
royal_command.description: Increases all allies' Attack and Defense for 2 turns.

sun_burst.name: Sun Burst

divine_radiance.name: Divine Radiance
divine_radiance.description: Heals all allies by 50% and grants them immunity for 3 turns.

storm_blade.name: Storm Blade
storm_blade.description: Attacks an enemy 3 times with storm-infused blade strikes.

tempest_rage.name: Tempest Rage
tempest_rage.description: Attacks all enemies and decreases their Attack Bar by 30%. Stuns for 1 turn with 50% chance.

fox_bite.description: Attacks an enemy and steals 20% of their Attack Bar.

rice_blessing.name: Rice Blessing

thunder_drums.description: Attacks all enemies with thunder drums and decreases their Attack Bar by 20%.

storm_calling.name: Storm Calling

wind_bag.name: Wind Bag

tornado_creation.description: Attacks all enemies with wind and applies slow for 2 turns.

flowing_music.name: Flowing Music
flowing_music.description: Heals all allies by 30% and increases their Attack Bar by 15%.

knowledge_stream.name: Knowledge Stream
knowledge_stream.description: Grants all allies immunity for 1 turn and increases their Critical Rate for 2 turns.

divine_archery.name: Divine Archery
divine_archery.description: Attacks an enemy with a guaranteed critical hit and applies Defense break for 2 turns.

battle_strategy.name: Battle Strategy
battle_strategy.description: Increases all allies' Attack and Critical Rate for 2 turns.

protection_ward.name: Protection Ward

sword_training.name: Sword Training
sword_training.description: Attacks an enemy 2 times with increased critical rate.

wind_flight.name: Wind Flight
wind_flight.description: Attacks all enemies and increases your Speed for 3 turns.

dragon_slayer.name: Dragon Slayer
dragon_slayer.description: Attacks an enemy with massive force, ignoring 50% of their defense. Always lands as a Critical Hit.

cosmic_order.description: Restores order to the battlefield, cleansing all allies and applying 3 random debuffs to all enemies.

primordial_chaos.description: Attacks all enemies and decreases their Max HP by 15% for the battle.

solar_justice.description: Attacks an enemy with solar light and removes all beneficial effects.
